main.name: Vineet Kumar
main.occupation: Web and mobile developer specializing in cross-platform, cloud-enabled, and Web3 application development
main.description: Developer by Day, Innovative && Freelancer by Night
main.bio: My name is Vineet, I Love coding because with just a few lines of code I can turn my ideas into reality, which potentially can impact the world and shape the future.
main.bio1: I am currently studying at the Indian Institute Of Information Technology, Lucknow in India for my Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: As a team member, you never fail to stand behind the team in good times and in difficult ones. With you on our team, we were able to reach our goals. It has always been a pleasure to work with you and be able to contribute in a meaningful way.
Vineet is a great team player. I worked with him in the Hack Gujarat competition. Besides his dedication to his work, he also motivates and helps others.
